content: ~ 1 ~ tiny mittens and stocking cap christmas ornaments ~ a knitwits heaven original design ~ materials 4 grams of fingering weight yarn in 2 colours ca & cb size 2 25 mm 1 us set of 4 short double pointed needles darning needle whip up these adorable little mittens and stocking cap as a tree ornament or a fun addition to your christmas gift packages it only takes a wee bit of leftover fingering weight yarn and is sure to be a fun christmas surprise size size is dependent on yarn used and personal gauge finished stocking cap from end to end measures around 5 and 1 25 across when laid flat the mittens measure 1 75 in length by 1 wide gauge 12 sts = 3 2 cm 1 25 in on 2 25 mm needles in stockinette stitches used inc1 lift bar between stitches and knit into the back of it mittens cast on 12 sts using long tail cast on with ca red place 4 sts on each of 3 needles and arrange to work in the round being careful not to twist rnds 1-5 k1 p1 around round 6 increase as follows k1 inc1 k2 inc1 k1 3x 6 sts per needle drop ca but don t cut rnds 7 & 8 with cb white knit round 9 k2 with cb k1 with ca repeat around drop cb but don t cut round 10 with ca p3 knit to end round 11 knit drop cb but don t cut rnds 12&13 with ca knit round 14 k2 red k1 white repeat around drop cb but don t cut round 15&16 with ca knit cut ca yarn ~ 2 ~ thread on needle and gently fasten to purl bumps on inside from previous row and pull the end to inside mitten to hide it it helps to get the ends fastened and drawn inside mitten so there are less tails hanging to get tangled round 17 with cb k2tog k1 around 12 sts round 18 knit round 19 k2tog k1 around 8 sts round 20 k2tog around 4 sts break yarn thread through sts pull up and secure hide end inside mitten thumb pick up 3 purl bumps from round 10 with needle round 1 with cb knit 3 with a 2nd needle pick up and knit 2 sts under the 3 working in the round round 2 knit cut cb rnds 3-5 with ca knit cut yarn thread through sts pull up and secure
